project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Economic Management Support Project (EMSP) is to increase the efficiency of Burundi's macroeconomic, financial, and administrative management by strengthening accountability and transparency through improved procedures and controls. The changes include: (i) new project activities; (ii) the revision of project components; and (iii) the structure and functions of the project coordination and monitoring mechanisms. The project will pursue past and ongoing efforts to improve collection of economic data, modernize public finance management systems and institutions, reform procurement practices, strengthen oversight institutions, improve the judicial system and privatize public enterprises, including restructuring and privatizing the export crop sector.
